item.description:
This is a collaborative trip with the Mass Park System. Details Below:

When

Sat, March 19, 10am – 2pm

Where

If you need a ride we can meet at Panera Bread by the Landmark Center (close to REI) at 9:30am (RSVP) or go there directly 177 Forest St., Saugus, MA

Description

Join the Friends of Breakheart reservation and Mass. DCR for a maple sugaring tour that includes: Tree I.D., tapping, sugaring history, wood cutting, boiling as well as pancakes and popcorn by a campfire!

Requested donation of $5 per person .
item.how_to_find_us: Either near fireplace at Panera (near REI) or at the park (I will be wearing an old man hat)
item.why: Weather is getting warm and there are no excuses now to get out into nature, start the spring season with a trip to the woodland of Breakheart reservation and maple syruping.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Maple Sugarin' at Breakheart
